data.title: The Drowsy Chaperone NYC Reviews and Tickets
data.meta_description: Click to discover The Drowsy Chaperone NYC reviews on Show-Score. Explore fan reviews, critic reviews, find out show information and get your tickets today.
data.text:
Lots Of Fun! Saw It June 2007

See it if you like to laugh. Fun music and performances.

Don't see it if you don't feel like going back in time to the days of very old movies.

Entertaining, Funny, Great Acting, Great Singing, Great Staging

See it if Sutton Foster's antics will make you smile and Beth Leavel did a masterful job.

Don't see it if Singing and dancing shows aren't your type of production or you're looking for a serious show rather than a musical comedy.

Slow

See it if there is nothing else you can go to...;-)

Don't see it if you don't like lengthy plays...

Absorbing, Clever, Delightful, Entertaining, Great Acting

See it if Very entertaining , quick moving play.

Don't see it if Can’t imagine anyone not liking this as it was so entertaining Read more

Delightful, Entertaining, Funny, Great Acting, Great Singing

See it if you liked it on Broadway - an excellent off-off production

Don't see it if you don't enjoy good music and fun Read more

Clever, Entertaining, Great Acting, Great Singing, Great Staging

See it if you enjoy a meta experience with dreamy sequences of multiple shows.

Don't see it if you expect a continuous storyline. It's more of a night with a theater-buff sharing random memories...

Clever, Delightful, Entertaining, Funny, Great Acting

See it if a funny show with lots of laughs where you come out feeling happy

Don't see it if I can't think of why someone wouldn't want to see this show

Clever, Delightful, Fluffy, Funny, Quirky

See it if you’re into 20’s revues or very goofy pieces that poke fun at the theatre lover in all of us.

Don't see it if you are seeking theatre that will change the world and delve into social issues.
